    • Method Detail

      • play

        public processing.core.PImage play(java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PImage> framesList)
        Used to play the Animation of Given FramesList of a Game Object
        Parameters:
        framesList - Represent the list of frames(images) of an Game Object
        Returns:
        Return a PImage, which is the current frame in Animation

      • positionBombAnimation

                                  int j,
                                  java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PImage> bombFramesList)
        Used to Animate the Bomb at given position
        Parameters:
        i - Represent the Y-axis Position of Bomb
        j - Represent the X-axis Position of Bomb
        bombFramesList - Represent a list of Frames(images) of Bomb

      • positionAnimation

        public void positionAnimation(int mDirection,
                              int xPos,
                              int yPos,
                              java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PImage> downFramesList,
                              java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PImage> upFramesList,
                              java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PImage> rightFramesList,
                              java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PImage> leftFramesList)
        Used to Animate the Game Object (BombGuy, Red Enemy, Yellow Enemy) at given position
        Parameters:
        mDirection - Represent the direction of motion of given Game Object
        xPos - Represents the X-axis Position of Game Object
        yPos - Represents the Y-axis Position of Game Object
        downFramesList - Represents the list of frames of Game Object for downward motion
        upFramesList - Represents the list of frames of Game Object for upward motion
        rightFramesList - Represents the list of frames of Game Object for rightward motion
        leftFramesList - Represents the list of frames of Game Object for leftward motion
